attributes.action: Protect the rights of children to NOT be adopted by same sex couples
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government intends to allow the adoption of children by same sex couples in an attempt to reduce discrimination against gays. 
This is not an issue of discrimination against gays, it is the right of a child to be brought up by a mother & father.
This is also not as many contend only a religious issue. Non religious people are also appalled at the possibilty of gay adoption.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
